main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a single unidentified object in Bovey, Minnesota on April 15, 1966.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 3 hours., The object was described as round and red., The object was reported to have exploded with two white flashes before moving on., The observer recorded the sighting while driving in a car at tree top level., 5 other persons confirmed seeing the object during the sighting.
